channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2026 NFL Coaching/GM Tracker: Miami Dolphins Fire HC Mike McDaniel
item.description: The coaching carousel for the 2026 offseason is about to get moving. Here are the latest news and rumors from around the NFL!

item.title: 2025 NFL Wild Card Odds: Lines, Spreads for all 6 Games
item.description: Check out the odds for each of the six wild-card matchups, as well as what to know.

item.title: 2025 CFP Odds: Lines, Spreads for Each Semifinal Game
item.description: Check out the odds for the CFP semifinals, as well as what to know about both games.

item.title: Miami Dolphins Fire Head Coach Mike McDaniel After 4 Seasons
item.description: The Miami Dolphins have fired head coach Mike McDaniel after four seasons, the team announced on Thursday morning.

item.title: 2025 CFP Title Odds: Hoosiers Favored; Miami, Oregon Closing In
item.description: See the latest CFP title odds, now that the semifinal matchups have arrived.

item.title: Sources: Hawks end Young era, send G to Wiz
item.description: The Hawks are trading four-time All-Star Trae Young to the Wizards for CJ McCollum and Corey Kispert, sources said.

item.title: Best way to an Eagles defensive lineman's heart -- and performance? Meatballs
item.description: Vic Fangio introduced the Meatball Award this season for his defense to serve as that extra bit of motivation.

item.title: Secret sauce to Bills beating the Jaguars? A big key is the O-line
item.description: What makes up the Bills O-line unit's success and its diverse personalities off the field? Let them explain.

item.title: Sources: Bucs fire OC Grizzard, QB coach Lewis
item.description: Josh Grizzard has been fired by the Buccaneers after only one season as their offensive coordinator, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Dolphins fire coach McDaniel after 7-10 season
item.description: The Dolphins have fired head coach Mike McDaniel after Miami finished 7-10, its second straight season missing the playoffs.
